content: to test Systems Management API (SMAPI) vm/maint/cpformat.execEXEC to format multiple DASD volumes vm/maint/ssicmd.execEXEC to run a command on all single system image (SSI) members System requirements for downloading the web material The web material requires the following system configuration: Hard disk space: 41 KB Operating System: Linux Appendix C. Additional material 491 Downloading and extracting the web material This section lists code that is associated with this book. z/VM REXX EXECs and XEDIT macros This section lists all of the z/VM code that is included in the associated tar file:  CPFORMAT EXEC  SSICMD EXEC  PROFILE EXEC for Linux virtual machines  RHEL64 EXEC  SLES11S3 EXEC CPFORMAT EXEC The following code is for the EXEC that formats multiple DASD using CPFMTXA.
